list_definition.definition: to think of as likely to happen or come

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: We expect her on tomorrow’s train.

list_definition.definition: to think or believe (that something will happen)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He expects to be home tomorrow
I expect that he will go
‘Will she go too?’ ‘I expect so’ / ‘I don’t expect so’ / ‘I expect not.’
They expect high wages for their extremely skilled work
You are expected to tidy your own room.
